text: 28|4|niccayamaka hpir'avn, pumiyil mikavum perumai kontu, atil ullavarkalaip pala vakuppukkalakap pirittu, avarkalil oru pirivinarai palavinappatuttum poruttu avarkalutaiya an makkalaik kolai ceytu, pen makkalai uyirutan valavaittu vantan. Meyyakave (ivvaru) avan visamikalil oruvanakave iruntan
